en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each [Skill Boost] awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: 崇高のサファイア
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内のスキルブーストの覚醒数に応じて 攻撃力が上昇。（スキルブースト＋は2個分で加算）

kr_skill.name: 숭고의 사파이어
kr_skill.raw_description: 2턴 동안 팀 내의 스킬 부스트의 각성수에 따라 공격력이 상승 (스킬 부스트+는 2개로 계산)

na_skill.name: Sapphire of Nobility
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases by the number of [Skill Boost] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns (Skill Boost+ counts as 2)
